name: tiled-property-flattener
description: "Flattens the properties of the Tiled classes contained by any Tiled class, or Tiled object/layer, into the Tiled class's/object's/layer's own properties, as if it had inherited the properties. Additionally, allows the user to mark classes as being intentionally composite via the `@composite:` prefix to prevent inheritance."
author: rui-han-crh
